heading: HR00668
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE REVELATION OF THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE (PNP) THAT UP TO TEN (10)FOREIGNERS ARE TRAINING WITH LOCAL TERRORIST GROUPS BEFORE JOINING THE ISLAMIC STATE (IS) EXTREMISTS IN SYRIA
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY since 2017-01-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00668
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE REVELATION OF THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE (PNP) THAT UP TO TEN (10)FOREIGNERS ARE TRAINING WITH LOCAL TERRORIST GROUPS BEFORE JOINING THE ISLAMIC STATE (IS) EXTREMISTS IN SYRIA

DATE FILED : 2017-01-11
